body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

Name a resource the same as its package

### Toy example:
```
from spack import *
import os

class StupidTest(Package):
    url      = "file://{0}/a.tgz".format(os.getcwd())

    version('1.2.3', sha256='4dcdeb610dbb2ff9ed08b90964af9b686ef9c44025db538cf46c1947b7d92ba2')

    resource(name='stupid-test',
             url='file://{0}/b.tgz'.format(os.getcwd()),
             sha256='b9b6fbcc28e2d43047f8f1250a5f74c9904d45aaed12292faa895caab98d4235',
             destination='somewhere'
            )
```
On first stage, the resource will expand as expected. The next stage will incorrectly reference the source package instead of the resource.

title: a resource with the same name as the package will use the wrong cached archive
